directions: Mix flour, oats, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, baking powder, and salt together in a microwave-safe mug. Stir egg white, milk, brown sugar, and vanilla extract into flour mixture until batter is fully combined; slowly stir in blueberries.
Cook in microwave for 1 minute. Check muffin for doneness and continue cooking in 15 second increments until cooked through, about 1 minute more.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon milk, or more as needed
1 tablespoon brown sugar, or more to taste
title: Microwave Blueberry Muffin in a Mug
